title: Suggestion for Yasuo.
body:
I play Yasuo a lot, he has to be tied with Azir for my fave champ but i cant ignore how powerful he can be, a bit too much at times, so one idea i had for him is either to make it impossible for him to crit on minions or to make his passive not double the crit chance on minions. my reasoning is this:
Yasuo has very strong dueling and team fight potential and waveclear and is AD so can take towers easily in a lane where most champs basic attacks do almost nothing, not to mention he can solo drag etc, he also doesnt have to worry abut cooldowns or mana, and tbh he doesn't really need ALL of that. so hurting his wave clear a bit will not only reduce his number of powerful aspects but because he won't get as many minions his huge power spike will be delayed till a bit later in the game, as it stands, once he has shiv and IE, 2 EQ combos (1 if you're lucky and they are grouped) kills a whole wave instantly, and he is still AD anyway so he can still get minions more easily than other champs, and it wont hurt his duelling or teamfight potential in any way other than delaying his powerspike slightly, it wont even affect his early game where he is just last hitting.

what do you guys think?

replies.body: Then would Viktor need a nerf? One E with upgraded augment kills melee and caster minions, and gets the siege minion to half health

get lost, he was nerfed enough already, if you do well, it means you played well, high risk high reward champion.

  **+** if you ruin his farm like that, it would be like cutting off his sword arm and making him use the other. He won't be viable if he falls behind in anyway. If yasuo falls behind, the only way to make a comeback on him is to farm, or get lucky and participate in a quadra-penta. also, because yasuo is practically a melee adc, he needs to be able to have high wave clear. If he didn't he would be like a bard trying to kill a minion with q, no better example, its like taking rockets from jinx. Yasuo isn't "strong" per se` he is just good for using to make plays with if you know what your doing, he is only "strong" in the hands of someone who knows what they are doing with him.
I kinda like the idea but I don't really feel like he needs any nerfs.
